medical_history.chief_complaint: Dizziness, headache, night sweats, and poor appetite.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began two days prior to presentation, described as general malaise with decreased appetite and sweating. Initially felt well after surgery for 3 days, then experienced onset of symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, Hyperlipidemia, status post parathyroidectomy for primary hyperparathyroidism (adenoma), history of hysterectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Family history positive for melanoma. Father died of myocardial infarction at age ___ (smoked), with a history of heart disease in paternal side. Mother had hypertension and died at age ___. Two children alive and well.
